sentences.en: Before kickoff, parents and grandparents milled and mingled and doddered and eventually sat down.
sentences.cn: 开球之前, 父母与祖父母们走来走去,混在一起,有的步履蹒跚,而最终都坐了下来.

sentences.en: Football To run with ( the ball ) after a kickoff, a punt, an interception, or a fumble.
sentences.cn: 在开球 、 悬空球 、 拦截或失球后的带 ( 球 ) 跑.

sentences.en: Game front with toss the coin of way to decide that brigade first kickoff.
sentences.cn: 比赛前以掷硬币的方式来决定那一队先开球.

sentences.en: It'started raining right after the kickoff of the soccer game.
sentences.cn: 足球赛一开球就开始下雨了.

sentences.en: RI President William B . Boyd introduces his family during the kickoff of the 2007 RI Convention.
sentences.cn: 国际扶轮社长威廉? 白义德 在2007年国际扶轮年会开始的期间介绍他的家庭.

sentences.en: RI President William B. Boyd introduces his family during the kickoff of the 2007 RI Convention.
sentences.cn: 国际扶轮社长威廉? 义德在2007年国际扶轮年会开始的期间介绍他的家庭.

sentences.en: Sergio Almiron is eager to kickoff his Juventus career.
sentences.cn: 阿尔米隆非常渴望为尤文效力.

sentences.en: Taking a stroll before kickoff, we met many cadets in neatly pressed uniforms.
sentences.cn: 开始之前, 我们到处转了转,碰到许多穿着整齐制服的学员.

sentences.en: Taking stroll before kickoff, we met many cadets neatly pressed uniforms.
sentences.cn: 开始之前,处转转, 碰许多穿着整齐制服学员.

sentences.en: They are lining up in position for the kickoff.
sentences.cn: 他们正排起阵势准备开球.

sentences.en: They used a power play to return the kickoff.
sentences.cn: 他们在开球后采用集中进攻发动回球反攻.

sentences.en: Theyre lining up in position for the kickoff.
sentences.cn: 他们正摆开阵势准备开球.

sentences.en: This was a very aggressive contest, with both sides firing from all barrels from kickoff.
sentences.cn: 这是一场野蛮的较量, 双方从开始就全线开火.

sentences.en: To begin or resume play with a kickoff.
sentences.cn: 开球开始球赛或中线开球.

sentences.en: We had a project kickoff meeting this morning.
sentences.cn: 我们今天上午开了个项目开始的会议.

trans.tran_en: the time when a football game starts, or the first kick of the game
